title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Linear Inequality Formative Assessment and Feedback Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic algebraic computational skills and foundational mathematical thinking for solving everyday problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can concretely explain problems arising in practical situations by utilizing algebraic inequalities.
Learners can verbally record and share their problem-solving processes using mobile devices.
Learners can improve their algebraic inequality-solving strategies by incorporating feedback from peers and instructors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
